page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: EAST NEWCASTLE At 8.00 am I get up, washed and dressed.I go downstairs and have my cornflakes.At 8.30am I leave the house and walk to school.When I arrive there I wait for my friend Debbie and when she comes I talk to her until we go in at 8.55am.We go into class for registration and then we do work from the board until dinner time at 12 noon.When I return at 1.00pm I talk to my friends.At 1.10pm we go in and finish our work.AT 2.20pm we go out to play Twp Balls until 2.30pm.After playtime we sometimes do Art and Craft until 3.30pm which is home time. Whan I get home I watch TV until teatime at 5.00pm. After tea I wash the dishes then I go out to play until 9.00pm.When I go home I get washed and ready for bed.At 9.30pm I go to bed. Jacqui 11 year old girl
